entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst Dev Tools not Supported #5561
  • Update Picker modal using DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged. #5557
  • After upgrade to 2022 17.2 Preview 2 margin and padding require XAML format on compile, CSS format works after hot swapping when app is running #5556
  • Missing TextColor in MenuBar #5554
  • ListView, TableView crashes on windows #5551
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Flyout Menu Renders Fullscreen when App Initially Opens #5550
  • [iOS] Preview 14 Shell Tabbar Renders as Blank White Screen on iOS #5549
  • Resolve XAML BindingContexts from ServiceCollection #5544
  • template for maui blazor preview #5543
  • Changing Detail of a FlyoutPage leads to an empty page on Android #5541
  • Alignment on MacCatalyst is now incorrect after recent FlowDirection changes #5537
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Some Essentials APIs crash when using multi-window #5536
    6.0.300

Closed

  • RadioButton - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5502
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Controls aligned to right are cropped on Android #5214
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Hot Reload is not fully working #3973
    6.0.300
  • Microsoft.UI.Xaml does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft' #4931
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Dotnet-podcasts app fails to build for iOS #5400
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] App crashes when start from background #4169
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • CarouselPage Migration #5526
  • Html from Local File in Windows #5523
  • Toolbar Icons missing on Windows #5452
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should compile RowDefinition and ColumnDefinition CollectionTypeConverters #5430
  • [Templates] No ResourceDictionary template #4534
  • [Android]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4285
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Android: Elements are clipped incorrectly if Element.Clip is set to EllipseGeometry #3843
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting Android from VS (Windows) #4919
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting WinUI #4926
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • A CarouselPage so that we can swipe between different Pages without using templates. #4606
  • [Bug] ImageButtons Aspect behave diferent depending on platform #3272
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • RCL Hybrid App _component dosnt load on windows/android platform #5392
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Neutral culture RESX File causes Build error #5538
  • Can't build for iOS simulators in p14, codesign exited with code 1 #5530

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix more text alignment issues #5563
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Modernize Essentials Namespaces #5562
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update global.json to use `6.0.300-preview` #5560
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update AOT Profile #5559
  • Update MAUI Graphics #5552
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1

Merged

  • Update the Windows path so we null check like UWP #5555
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [android] port RootLayout.axml to Java #5528
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Importing Maui property pages #5529
  • Use effective flow direction when determining text alignment #5558
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix ImageConverter #5522
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • RadioButton - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5553
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Revert unnecessary changes in Android ScrollView (impact in perf) #5540
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix Shapes Aspect property #5225
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Graphics hover events to the Graphics View #5548
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [X] compile gridlength and row|defcollection #5489
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Add Resource Dictionary Template #5052
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix drawing issues related with clipping views or drawing shadows #5545
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, high, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample in the gallery loading a local html file in WebView #5539
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-webview
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Graphics events #5498
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update MacOS Repo Setup Instructions #5525
    area/setup 🪄
  • Review of the "Essentials" interface API #5407
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Ensure that DispatchTimer is re-started if Start() is called again. (on Windows) #5533
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, s/verified, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Ported pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms #5510
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [android] update Xamarin.Google.Guava.ListenableFuture #5305
    platform/android 🤖
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
